title: Explosion Accident Response Simulation Gamification Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic first aid and safety management principles
context.additional_context: Gamifying real explosion accident scenarios to provide an immersive learning environment, enhancing collaborative decision-making training among learners

learning_goals: Perform initial response procedures (reporting, evacuation guidance, first aid) during explosion incidents with 90% accuracy through simulation games
Apply at least three explosion-type-specific response strategies by scenario through in-game crisis judgment missions
Achieve weekly simulation evaluation scores above 80 points and 100% peer feedback implementation rate during the learning period
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
